description: Slowest increasing sequence with property that a(n) does not divide any term of form a(n+m*a(n)) for any m; this is the slowest increasing "non-difference-divisible" sequence.
references: Mason, J. 1990, Difference-Divisible Sequences, Math. Gazette 74 (469) pp. 223-228.
Mason, J. 1989, Mathematical Abstraction Seen and a Delicate Shift of Attention, For the learning of Mathematics 9 (2) pp. 2-8.
author: _John H. Mason_
